Tupperpot

Bistro

View Menu

712 Brooklyn St ,
New York, NY

Gather your loved ones for food and quality time at our cozy Junction restaurant that serves wholesome plant-based asian fusion dishes. Grasshopper Eatery is open for lunch and dinner or anything in between.

Appetizers

Rice Popper 8

Have yourself an arancini ball — with red rice, chili vegetables and irresistible dipping sauce.


Popcorn Nuggets 8

Cornflake-coated crispy pieces of seasoned non-GMO soy, ancient grains and veggies, served with gochujang mayo, wasabi mayo or mild BBQ sauce. (This is dunk food.)


Seongnyu Mandu 10

Lightly-seared ravioli stuffed with sweet shitake mushrooms, red jalapenos, and caramelized onions. Served in a spicy fermented dashi broth and garnished with Kimchi (x3).


Beet Salad GF 10

Roasted beets in a tangy-glazed marinade served with mizuna tossed in a creamy avocado-pesto and garnished with seasoned crispy chickpeas, cultured walnut cheese, and pumpkin seeds.


Japarese Salad GF 9

Heirloom cherry tomatoes, soft cultured cashew cheese, and Romesco garnished with balsamic reduction and lemon zested mizuna.


Hummus Trio Platter (GF option) 18

Sharable platter of three house-made hummus dips: sweet, savory, and original. Served with falafel, roasted vegetables, rice crackers, and pita (not GF).


-Falafels (x3) +Add 4
-Rice crackers +Add 4
-Veggies +Add 6
-Pita chips +Add 4

Brunch

Okonomi-Yaki 13

This savoury Japanese pancake is as authentic* as it is addictive: Stuffed with cabbage, green onion, and topped with pickled ginger, house-made veganaise and salty-sweet okonomi sauce, it’s served up in a traditional skillet. (*The dish hails from Osaka, which is also Chef Haru’s home city.)


Pancakes, Japanese Style 15

Meet the fluffiest vegan pancakes you have ever tasted thanks to the chickpea-juice meringue. Toppings vary every weekend — from whipped cream and mixed berries to banana and caramel — but all were created equally delicious.


Kimchi Mac & “Cheese” GF 13

This tasty twist on our famous comfort-food upgrade features “cheese sauce” with a cashew base and magic ingredients kimchi and gochujang mayo. Tender gluten-free noodles are tossed in this spicy, creamy made-from-scratch sauce. (Why wait until dinner?)


Breakfast Bowl GF 14

Be bowled over by this rainbow of healthy veggies including roasted sweet potato, roasted potato, avocado, tofu scramble and cherry tomatoes, all drizzled with aioli and served on a bed of genmai rice.


Better Benny 16

Ripe avocado and vegan cashew-based “hollandaise” sit atop fluffy Japanese mini-pancakes topped with spinach, sautéed mushrooms and hand-pulled “pork,” accompanied by a fresh side salad of mizuna greens and carrots, as well as crisp roast potatoes. (Game changer.)


Chick-Un and Waffles 15

Crispy Chick-Un glazed with sweet Buffalo sauce, served on a house-made basil-and-oregano waffle. (Tastes just as good morning, noon and night!)


Healthy Morning Mix 14

When you can’t decide, have it all! An open-faced toasted sandwich with ripe avocado and jackfruit “tuna,” topped with creamy cashew sauce, is served with a side of house-made soy yogurt topped with crunchy matcha granola and fruits.

 

Plates

All plates are served with your choice of side: soup, salad or fries.
Stuffed Burger 16

Tofu and veggie patty stuffed with soft cashew cheese and topped with sautéed mushrooms, seared onions, lettuce, aioli, BBQ sauce, and crispy onion chips. Served on a whole wheat bun.


Crispy Chick-Un Wrap 16

Crispy chick-un battered and served with lettuce, tomato, pickles, burdock kinpira, veganaise and a spicy aioli in a whole wheat wrap.


Teriyaki Chick-Un Burger 16

Fried chick-un dipped in teriyaki sauce on a whole wheat bun served with pickles, tomato, veganaise, and a creamy cashew sauce.


Pulled Pork 15

Crispy seitan marinated in BBQ sauce served on a whole wheat bun with pineapple coleslaw, daikon rasish, and veganaise.


Spicy Vietnamese Banh Mi 16

Traditional Vietnamese with a modern twist. Maggi marinated seared tofu, pickled carrots, cucumber, lemongrass aioli, baby kale, cilantro, and micro radish.

 

Bowls

Quinoa Harvest GF 16

Curried chickpeas, zucchini, baby kale, sautéed bok choy, avocado, hemp seeds, and micro greens served atop warm quinoa with a creamy garlic sauce.


Shiro Truffle Penne 18

Lentil penne tossed in a white wine truffle creamed cheese garlic sauce served with roasted brussels sprouts, broccoli, and a herbed wild mushroom mix. Garnished with Gremolata, cashew parmesan, and lemon.

Japanese Curry 16

Eggplant, button mushrooms, zucchini, pumpkin, red peppers, lotus root chips, and genmai rice served in a bowl of umami curry garnished with coconut milk.


Dandan Noodles 17

Kale noodles served in a creamy tahini sauce with tofu pork, bok choy Zakuzaku-rayu, sesame seeds, shredded chili and a wedge of lemon. +Add soba noodles for GF upgrade $4.


Hopper Salad GF 16

Cultured blueberry cheese, roasted almonds, lemoned strawberries, roasted beets, and heirloom cherry tomatoes tossed in a raspberry vinaigrette and garnished with lotus root chips and candied pumpkin and hemp seed crumble.


Hemp Caesar Salad GF 14

Creamy, protein-rich, chickpea and caper Caesar dressing on a bed of roasted and raw kale. Topped with roasted brussels sprouts, broccoli, bean curd smoky bacon, cashew parmesan, GF croutons, and hemp seeds.

The items and prices of our menus are subject to change without notice and are displayed for informational purposes only. If you have serious allergies please give us a call before your visit so we can ensure you have an amazing experience.
